message: The cold weather is here (or almost here) and I love LOVE hybernating.  The problem is that I fix meals that make you feel warm and full in the tummy.  So I was looking for something to fix for the weekend.  Got any suggestions?  What are you going to do?

I love a bowl of yummy soup. We make happy soup. Basically it is whatever veggie you like and tomatoes with a chicken flavor base. Then add a few bay leaves and whatever seasonings you like. All the colors, flavors, and everything makes you happy!
Homemade mac and 'cheese'. Hands down, the best comfort food!
My favorite is hot and hearty soup... either chili or butternut squash stew....

Easy homemade chili....one can chili beans, one 15 oz. can tomato sauce, one cup water, Quorn faux beef crumbles and chili seasoning.  I'm allergic to peppers though so I just season mine with cumin, salt and pepper.
